00002 // FastDB                    Version 1.0         (c) 1999  GARRET    *     ?  *

00007 //-------------------------------------------------------------------*--------*
00008 // Database table field reference type
00009 //-------------------------------------------------------------------*--------*
00010 
00011 #ifndef __REFERENCE_H__
00012 #define __REFERENCE_H__
00013 
00014 BEGIN_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00015 
00019 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbAnyReference {  
00020     friend class dbAnyCursor;
00021     friend class dbDatabase;
00022     friend class dbFieldDescriptor;
00023   protected:
00024     oid_t       oid;
00025 
00026   public: 
00027     dbAnyReference(oid_t oid = 0) { 
00028         this->oid = oid;
00029     }
00034     oid_t getOid() const { 
00035         return oid;
00036     }
00037 
00041     bool operator > (dbAnyReference const& ref) const { 
00042         return oid > ref.oid; 
00043     }
00044 
00048     bool operator < (dbAnyReference const& ref) const { 
00049         return oid < ref.oid; 
00050     }
00051 
00055     friend bool isNull(dbAnyReference const& ref) { 
00056         return ref.oid == 0; 
00057     }
00058     
00062     bool isNull() const { return oid == 0; }
00063 
00064     dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponents(dbFieldDescriptor* fd) {
00065         fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpReference;
00066         fd->refTable = NULL;
00067         fd->dbsSize = fd->alignment = sizeof(oid_t);
00068         return NULL;
00069     }
00070 };
00071 
00075 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbNullReference {};
00076 
00080 extern FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbNullReference null;
00081 
00082 #if (defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER+0 < 1200 || _MSC_VER >= 1310)) || defined(__MWERKS__)
00083 //
00084 // Visual C++ prior to 5.0 version (with applied Service Pack 3)
00085 // didn't support lazy template instantiation. As far as VC has bug
00086 // with treating local function prototypes, we have to use friend function.
00087 //
00088 template<class T>
00089 extern dbTableDescriptor* dbGetTableDescriptor(T*);
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 
00096 template<class T>
00097 class dbReference : public dbAnyReference { 
00098   public:
00102     dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponents(dbFieldDescriptor* fd) { 
00103         fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpReference;
00104 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER+0 < 1200 || _MSC_VER >= 1310) || defined(__MWERKS__)
00105         fd->refTable = dbGetTableDescriptor((T*)0);
00106 #else
00107 #if GNUC_BEFORE(2,96) || defined(__VACPP_MULTI__) || defined(__IBMCPP__)
00108         extern dbTableDescriptor* dbGetTableDescriptor(T*);
00109         fd->refTable = dbGetTableDescriptor((T*)0);
00110 #else
00111         fd->refTable = &T::dbDescriptor;
00112 #endif
00113 #endif
00114         fd->dbsSize = fd->alignment = sizeof(oid_t);
00115         return NULL;
00116     }
00117 
00123     dbReference& operator = (dbReference const& ref) { 
00124         oid = ref.oid;
00125         return *this;
00126     }
00127 
00132     dbReference& operator = (dbNullReference const&) { 
00133         oid = 0;
00134         return *this;
00135     }
00136 
00142     dbReference<T>& unsafeAssign(dbAnyReference const& ref) {
00143         oid = ref.getOid();
00144         return *this;
00145     }
00146  
00150     bool operator == (dbReference const& ref) const { 
00151         return oid == ref.oid; 
00152     }
00153 
00157     bool operator > (dbReference const& ref) const { 
00158         return oid > ref.oid; 
00159     }
00160 
00164     bool operator < (dbReference const& ref) const { 
00165         return oid < ref.oid; 
00166     }
00167 
00171     bool operator != (dbReference const& ref) const { 
00172         return oid != ref.oid; 
00173     }
00174 
00178     bool operator == (dbNullReference const&) const { 
00179         return oid == 0;
00180     }
00181 
00185     bool operator != (dbNullReference const&) const { 
00186         return oid != 0;
00187     }
00188 
00192     dbReference(dbNullReference const&) : dbAnyReference(0) {}
00193 
00197     dbReference(dbReference const& ref) : dbAnyReference(ref.oid) {}
00198     
00205     dbReference(oid_t oid=0) : dbAnyReference(oid) {}
00206 };
00207 
00208 END_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00209 
00210 #endif
